content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Salary and Paydays\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Compensation is paid monthly and consists of three payments:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advance\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is paid on the 21\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"st\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of the month for the current month. The first payment is 50 BYN. If the employee is hired for part-time employment, the amount of the advance is determined in proportion to the working hours. Subsequent payments can be increased by request, up to 45% of the base pay. Requests to increase or decrease the advance payment should be sent to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAdvanceBY@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFAAdvanceBY@epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" not later than 1 working day before the date of the payment. Please note, that you will receive a reply from WFA Advance BY not earlier than 2-3 days prior to the date of the payment. The amount of the payment can’t be more than 45% of the base pay minus tax and other mandatory deductions, or less than 10 BYN;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The rest of the base pay\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is paid on the 7\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" of each month for the previous month;\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The bonus part\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (in case of project assignment) is paid on the 15\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" day of the month following the month of cooperation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"If any of these dates fall on a weekend or holiday, compensation is paid on the last working day before the date.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All payments are made to Priorbank cards in Belarusian rubles. Within a few days after the salary payment, a detailed payslip is sent to employees via e-mail.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-warning\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Your salary depends on hours worked, so \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"if you work part-time the amount will be reduced proportionally\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You may address your questions on salary and compensation scheme to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAAnywhereSalary@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Anywhere Salary\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Leaves and vacation\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The duration of the regular paid vacation is regulated by the labor legislation of Belarus. Each Employee has 24 calendar days of paid vacation every year. You can split your vacations into 10 and 14 calendar days accordingly or take 24 calendar days in a row. To apply for such vacation the Employee must provide a written application to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFASalaryGroupAccountingBY@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Salary Group Accounting BY\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" at least two weeks before absence at work:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"attachment\",\"data\":{\"size\":25600,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/652314a0-8b16-4472-93df-b006e5b71a94/образец заявления на трудовой отпуск.doc\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/652314a0-8b16-4472-93df-b006e5b71a94/образец заявления на трудовой отпуск.doc\",\"fileName\":\"образец заявления на трудовой отпуск.doc\",\"name\":\"образец заявления на трудовой отпуск.doc\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"application\",\"subtype\":\"msword\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"attachment\",\"id\":\"652314a0-8b16-4472-93df-b006e5b71a94\",\"extension\":\"doc\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In case of child's birth, wedding, close relatives' loss, employees are also granted from one to three days' paid leave.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please remember that for any type of leave you need to create a vacation request at \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://vacation.epam.com/epm-vts-web/dashboard\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"vacation.epam.com\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Google Chrome is the only supported browser).
